=== MANUAL PUBLISHING COMMANDS ===

## Method 1: Using .pypirc file (recommended)
# After setting up ~/.pypirc with your tokens:

# Test on TestPyPI first:
/Users/akhshy/.pyenv/versions/3.13.5/bin/python -m twine upload --repository testpypi dist/*

# If successful, publish to production PyPI:
/Users/akhshy/.pyenv/versions/3.13.5/bin/python -m twine upload dist/*

## Method 2: Using environment variables (alternative)
# Set your tokens as environment variables:
export TWINE_USERNAME=__token__
export TWINE_PASSWORD=your_pypi_token_here

# Test on TestPyPI:
/Users/akhshy/.pyenv/versions/3.13.5/bin/python -m twine upload --repository-url https://test.pypi.org/legacy/ dist/*

# Publish to production PyPI:
/Users/akhshy/.pyenv/versions/3.13.5/bin/python -m twine upload dist/*

## Method 3: Interactive (will prompt for credentials)
# Test on TestPyPI:
/Users/akhshy/.pyenv/versions/3.13.5/bin/python -m twine upload --repository-url https://test.pypi.org/legacy/ dist/*

# Publish to production PyPI:
/Users/akhshy/.pyenv/versions/3.13.5/bin/python -m twine upload dist/*
